Contacts.title: Contacts of the eco-estate “At Grandpa's village”
Contacts.text1: Despite his venerable age, your Grandpa is very modern, so he has a **Telegram-bot**, I know how much you love useful and convenient services.
Contacts.text2: Use to book a house, or ask

Visit.title: Choose when you plan to visit the Estate
Visit.text: “Grandpa will quickly find the best accommodation options for these days”

BookingForm.note1: Children under 3 years old without extra bed are not charged.
BookingForm.note2: Children from 3 to 12 years old, with a separate bed, are charged at the children's rate - 150 UAH/day.

Rules.title: Your grandfather has some small whishes and rules that apply in the eco-estate
Rules.note2: Grandpa and the team of the Eco-estate “At Grandpa's village” are your friends, always ready to help and make your vacation pleasant and unforgettable.
Rules.note3: Also remember that we cannot control the weather and other external circumstances, but we guarantee you a warm welcome and a comfortable stay.
Rules.note4: “At Grandpa's village” guests get good, pleasant emotions and create unique, warm memories.
